subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: General Manager Omar Minaya and three other Mets officials dined Tuesday night with pitcher Barry Zito and his agent, Scott Boras, cementing the Mets as a major player in the expanding Zito sweepstakes.
snippet: General Manager Omar Minaya and three other Mets officials dined Tuesday night with pitcher Barry Zito and his agent, Scott Boras, cementing the Mets as a major player in the expanding Zito sweepstakes.
